name: Aim to be a Pokémon master!
name_original: Aim to be a Pokémon master!
description:
Aim to be a Pokémon master! is an adventure game developed by sunnyyang. It came out on 09-04-2023. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Aim to be a Pokémon master! on Android, Linux, macOS and PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
